page.title: 12HOUSING cont.
page.content:
The houses in Craghead have 2/3 bedrooms,upstairs or downstairs bathroom and toilet,and most houses have gardens or outer buildings.
SOUTH STANLEY My house is a council house,it was built in 1950's.We pay Â£23.67 rent each week,the rates are included in the rent.To buy our house today would cost Â£14000. It is a 3 bedroomed house,we have 2 public rooms,a kitchen,a toilet and a bathroom.We have a garden attached,a shed and a coal house.We have no garage,although we can rent a garage from Derwentside District Council.
